actions.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1275 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 45. Record Vote Number: 284.

Amendment SA 1275 proposed by Senator Corzine. (consideration: CR S9471-9475, S9480; text: CR S9471-9473) To establish the National Commission on the Development and Use of Intelligence Related to Iraq.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1275 proposed by Senator Corzine.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1275 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 45. Record Vote Number: 284.

purpose: To establish the National Commission on the Development and Use of Intelligence Related to Iraq.
